Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 9 from any)
Ruffian: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item/Earning Income using Underworld Lore gives increased earnings
Foil Senses: Automatically takes precautions against special senses when using Avoid Notice, Hide, or Sneak
Legendary Sneak: Can use Hide and Sneak without cover/Automatically uses Avoid Notice when exploring
Quiet Allies: Rolls a single Stealth check to Avoid Notice when leading a group
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Swift Sneak: Can Sneak at full Speed
Terrain Stalker (Underbrush): Sneaking 5' in underbrush at least 10' from foes requires no Stealth check
Combat
Hit Points: 26 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Ruffian: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Ruffian: Can use any simple weapon to sneak attack/Critical hits with a d8 or lighter simple weapon on a flat-footed foe inflict its critical specialization effect
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
You're Next: (R) After downing one foe, makes a +2 Intimidation check to Demoralize another
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)

Notes
Validation Errors:
